summary: Distance: Peter Parker x Reader Imagine
title: Distance: Peter Parker x Reader Imagine
body:
Where you don’t know who he is.

Word Count: 933

Warnings: uhhh angst? As usual.

a/n: heyy its been a while, I haven’t had much inspiration or motivation but here’s this. Hope you enjoy :)

masterlist

——

Peter Parker, lovable, kind-hearted Peter Parker was always there when you needed him. Up late with a soft smile and warm hands, whispering sweet nothings to calm your senses when all you could feel was panic, always so unbelievably sweet.

At least that’s what it used to be like.

Now all he spares are timid glances, leaving behind uncertainty, a bitter feeling that made you feel like curling up into a ball.

Peter Parker, lovable, kind-hearted Peter Parker now left you alone when you needed him the most. Oblivious to your attempts to get him to stay, almost begging with vulnerable eyes when he shrugs and says, “I better get home.”

Leaving you to fix the damage to your heart.

Eventually, the heartbreak became a routine, you set yourself up for it every time. But now, you just couldn’t hide it anymore.

You were convinced that the frown on your face was permanent, passing through the halls with your head hung low and books clutched to your chest. He was standing at your locker as always, laughing at something Ned said to him.  You desperately wanted to smile, but all you felt was numb, completely and utterly numb.

His eyes caught yours, his demeanour faltering when he saw your tired eyes and sluggish posture. You sent him a small glance, opening up your locker as he and Ned peered over puzzled.  

“(Y/N)?” Peter asked quietly.

You hummed softly in response, refusing to look him the eye in fear that you might start bawling on the spot.

He could cut the tension with a knife. It radiated between the both of you, almost too much to handle.

“Are you feeling okay?” he questioned innocently.

You nod without a word, shut your locker as the bell rang loudly. Students sent out like a stampede towards their classes and suddenly you were happy about this chaos.

“I’ll uh, see you during Chemistry,” you mutter before speeding off into the cluster of students.

The boys look at each other with confusion in their eyes. Ned shrugs and Peter stares back at your figure disappearing into the crowd

-

You didn’t see Peter at Chemistry.

Somehow the thought made you sick to your stomach that during English you raced off to the nurse. You blamed it on nerves, letting you go home with a sad smile.

You just couldn’t handle it, seeing lovable, kind-hearted Peter Parker look at you with those honey speckled eyes. If you did, you knew you would forget why you were upset.

So now, you laid back on your bed with the back of your head buried into your pillow and eyes flicked up at the blank ceiling.

A small knock on your bedroom door brought you back into reality. Sitting up, you slip off of your bed and head towards your door, hand coming out to grasp your door handle.

You are met with a set of chocolate curls and wary eyes, almost slamming the door on his face, but you refrain.

“Hi,” he speaks softly, eyes roaming your small frame drowning in a large sweatshirt.

“Hi,” you respond timidly.

“Can I come in?”

You nod, stepping out of the way and sitting back onto your bed as he closes the door behind you.

He stands up in front of you, gazing down as you look away from his intense gaze.

“I know you’re not genuinely sick, there’s no way you would miss out on English,” he nearly laughs.

You remain silent, he knew you all too well.

“You’ve been so withdrawn lately, what’s going on with you?” he questions with desperation laced in his tone.

You couldn’t help the harsh laugh that fell from your lips, shaking your head as the sound made his head snap up swiftly.

“What is my favourite colour?” you urge.  

He opens his mouth to answer but the words seem to be caught up in his throat.  He is rendered speechless, a bitter smile graces your lips.

“Who even are you Peter?” you scoff, standing up abruptly from your spot of the bed in front of him.

His mouth is dry, staring back at you with his tongue tied.

“You’re hardly around anymore! One minute your promising me that you’ll always be there and then you’re disappearing off to god knows where,” you exclaim.

“Peter, I try so hard to be there for you all the time. But this can’t just be all me, so if you’re going to keep doing this then I can’t let this go on any longer,” you motion between the both of you making his eyes widen slightly.  

Peter’s eyes glass over, unable to figure out what to say or do.

“I’m scared.”

Your breathing slows, looking back at his sad eyes in confusion.

“I’m so scared that I’ll get too attached to you and you’ll be gone, like Ben and my parents. I’ve been trying so damn hard to push you away and pretend I don’t love you when I do, so much,” he confesses.

Your firm posture softens as the words escape his lips.

“Peter-”

“No I’m so sorry, I’ve been so selfish and disregarding how you may feel-” you cut him off with your lips softly pressing against his.

He melts into your touch, arms wrapping around your torso in desperation.  

You pull away slowly, eyes connecting with his. “You’re not going to lose me, Peter, I’m not going anywhere.”

He sniffles slightly, looking back at you with such adoration.

“I love you,” he whispers, pecking your lips lightly again,

Peter Parker, lovable, kind-hearted Peter Parker deserved the world.

body:
DEAR PETER,

DURING, 1

Pairings: Peter Parker x fem!Reader

Warnings: None (maybe I swore?)

Note: Remember that this is an AU and things will be drastically different! 

Summary: The Avengers decide to go on a mission. 

Words: 1.3k 

MASTER LIST 

Extra long today cause ya’ll are amazing!

The Stark tower was feeling empty without the rambunctious chatter of Thor and the presence of Bruce in the lab. Everyone was worried about their friends but they knew that the strongest Avengers would be fine without them.

The Avengers were never not busy, “There’s always some bad guy to stop,” Captain would say. But these days were quite almost too quiet for Tony’s liking he suspected something was up and waited for something bad to happen.

“Maybe the bad guys decided to take a vacation, Tony! Chill out man,” Sam said sipping on a beer. “Go skydiving  or take Pepper out.”

“As long as he isn’t bugging us all the time with false alarms I don’t care what he does,” Natasha rolled her eyes recalling how crazy Tony was turning out to be.

Tony tried to hide his anxiety and PTSD from everyone and pretended to be fine but everyone could see it. The feeling of something bad happening was eating him alive.

“You all say that but look, JARVIS show them ‘the super secret project’ please,” Tony dropped down on a couch and propped his feet on a table.

 "Just see for yourself,“ He mumbled as he swallowed a peg of scotch.

"As you wish sir,” JARVIS’ voice echoed through the room as a projection began.

All the avengers settled in for the show. Although they were wary of Tony’s ideas after Ultron but they stayed because they were all secretly bored and were itching to do some ass kicking.

“You see something suspicious in the picture?” Tony pointed out to the projection which seemed like a normal day in Brooklyn.

“Tony, where are you going with this?” Rhodey asked narrowing his eyes.

“Just watch. Jarvis, zoom in please.” Tony pointed towards the image and pointed grimly. Invisible to the naked eye was a small red dot and upon further zooming, it looked like a man who was in the air presumably flying but his actions mimicked swinging.“ that kid right there is our guy," 

"Does he have any powers?” Natasha asked Tony subconsciously leaning forward. Everyone was now interested, giving Tony their complete attention. Tony smirked internally yelling I told you so.

“His parlour tricks are pretty neat. He shoots webs, has super strength. Probably has enhanced senses too,” Tony explained flailing his arms around. A clear sign that he’s drunk.

“So what he’s a mutant?” Steve asks sobering up from the mead Thor brought from Asgard. The only reply he got was a non-committal grunt

“And why are you showing this to us? Are we recruiting him?” Natasha asks.

“No, the reason I’m showing you this spider boy is because he’s the next Darth Vader, Jarvis start the slideshow,”

“Okay, Tony he is literally saving a puppy from being run over by a food truck,” Natasha frowned at the video of Web pulling a golden retriever pup away from its imminent death.

“wait until you see the next one,”

“Okay, now he’s bringing a kitten down a tree, tony are you sure he’s our guy?” Rhodey questioned him quirking an eyebrow at him.

“And now he’s helping an old lady cross a street, Tony this guy looks like a poster child of superheroes, just let it be. You wasted enough time of ours already,” Clint groaned as he had enough of waiting for something to happen in the future and missing the now.

He shuddered as he remembered that he promised his kids to go out for dinner after watching their favourite Disney movie that they already watched five times in this week, but it looks like dinner has to wait.

“I see that our guests are getting bored. Jarvis, pull out his portfolio,”

“Peter Benjamin Parker 

Age: 16 

Relationship: single 

Guardian(s): May Parker, Benjamin Parker (deceased) 

Occupation: Student, Intern at Stark Internship 

Residence:…”

“All right that’s enough. That’s it, I’m out, I’m not going to be in a plan to terrorise a poor kid. Good night everyone,” Clint was out of the door before anyone could say anything. Clint’s departure made the group look amongst themselves. Silently communicating who’s going to pull Tony out of his funk.

The Captain sighed before he began.

“look, Tony… I know that you think that the whole Ultron thing was your fault, okay it kinda is but that doesn’t mean you can harass a kid,”

“Not to mention stalk the said16-year-old,” Natasha added dryly as she got up dusting Cheeto dust off her dust and made her way to the door.

Tony cursed before he said,

 "Wait, Widow! You might want to see this. JARVIS tell them about the girlfriend,“ Tony waved his hands in the air as Natasha sighed and sat beside Cap exchanging a look that said 'if he gets any crazier I’m killing him’

It wasn’t long before Jarvis showed your pictures, your details and your last seen whereabouts. The latest update on your story was that there were no updates. In a recent interview, your parents publicly broke down in front of the cameras begging for someone to come forward and say something and for someone to save their daughter. 

The slide show ended with a picture of you and Peter. You were hugging Peter from the behind and gave the camera a huge smile, your eyes twinkling with happiness. In the next picture, you were kissing Peter’s cheek his grin so wide that it occupied his entire face.

"She’s so beautiful,” said Pepper, who hasn’t spoken a word the entire evening. These days Pepper stayed quiet silently observing as her now Fiancé drove himself crazy with all the insufferable scenarios and wild predictions of the future.

“She is and she’s missing. There were no traces left by her. The last time she was heard of was when she left a voice mail to her the then boyfriend to break-up with him because he was acting suspiciously. And guess who goes missing immediately after. BINGO! Her,”

Although it was truly a heartbreaking incident it wasn’t their line of field. They handled aliens and Nazis, not missing teenage girls and Natasha voiced this concern.

“So? A girl goes missing and you decided to go Nancy Drew on her? Maybe she just ran away. Her heart was broken and she wanted some space,” Natasha suggested making her voice soft to cushion the harsh words she spoke. The words seemingly Dismissing the girl’s disappearance and the grief of her family.

“She disappeared without any trace Romanoff, do you really believe a teenage girl who ran away because of a high school boyfriend is smart enough to disappear without any paper trail and without any digital trace as well?” Natasha grew quiet as she contemplated Tony’s words. He was right. 

“So what? You think she’s involved in some organisation? Even so, why her?” Captain frowned as he tried to make sense of the situation, it wasn’t a difficult case but it was a little suspicious.

“There are Countless conspiracy theories online ranging from a foreign boyfriend to alien abduction. I have one myself and I know who to keep my money on,” Tony snapped his fingers as a new slideshow started.

“Remember New York? Ultron?” Tony asked. 

“Who doesn’t?” Pepper replied rolling her eyes and narrowing her eyes at her fiancé confused as to why he started talking about a drastically different topic.

“Well has anyone of us wondered what happened to the mess we left behind? The remains from the tesseract? We didn’t because we trusted SHIELD to take care of it. Well were fools to do so. Look,” he pointed to the projection and started it.

The video started off normally. Two men wearing trench coats were talking in a parking lot and soon their talking progressed into a heated argument and one of them pointed a gun towards the other and gestured towards a suitcase and the man fired at him but instead of a bullet a flash of blue engulfed the other man and in the span of seconds he disappeared right in front of their eyes without any trace.

“Looking familiar?” Tony asked looking at the horrified avengers glancing at each other hoping that the video was fake.

“Well, it looks like we have some leftovers,” said Rhodey as he looked at the corner of the picture where the red and blue wearing superhuman lurked. 

The grumbling of your stomach awoke you from your sleep. Your skin was papery and your eyes sunken deep in your skull. It had been days since you ate, ages since you tasted the sweet nothing taste of water. You could be wrong but you didn’t care about being right now.

The only thing that kept you going was him. His easy smile even though life had given him nothing but grief. His gentle touch that brought comfort and hope warmed your heart. You felt ashamed for having hope. You should’ve made your peace with them already. You were behaving like a weakling and they would be here soon. You couldn’t wait to get out here, and you didn’t care how you do. You just want an out.

As I promised here are the avengers! I promise that you would see Peter in the next chapter again. and also that there would be action!

DURING, 1

Pairings: Peter Parker x fem!Reader

Warnings: None (maybe I swore?)

Note: Remember that this is an AU and things will be drastically different! 

Summary: The Avengers decide to go on a mission. 

Words: 1.3k 

MASTER LIST 

Extra long today cause ya’ll are amazing!

The Stark tower was feeling empty without the rambunctious chatter of Thor and the presence of Bruce in the lab. Everyone was worried about their friends but they knew that the strongest Avengers would be fine without them.

The Avengers were never not busy, “There’s always some bad guy to stop,” Captain would say. But these days were quite almost too quiet for Tony’s liking he suspected something was up and waited for something bad to happen.

“Maybe the bad guys decided to take a vacation, Tony! Chill out man,” Sam said sipping on a beer. “Go skydiving  or take Pepper out.”

“As long as he isn’t bugging us all the time with false alarms I don’t care what he does,” Natasha rolled her eyes recalling how crazy Tony was turning out to be.

Tony tried to hide his anxiety and PTSD from everyone and pretended to be fine but everyone could see it. The feeling of something bad happening was eating him alive.

“You all say that but look, JARVIS show them ‘the super secret project’ please,” Tony dropped down on a couch and propped his feet on a table.

 "Just see for yourself,“ He mumbled as he swallowed a peg of scotch.

"As you wish sir,” JARVIS’ voice echoed through the room as a projection began.

All the avengers settled in for the show. Although they were wary of Tony’s ideas after Ultron but they stayed because they were all secretly bored and were itching to do some ass kicking.

“You see something suspicious in the picture?” Tony pointed out to the projection which seemed like a normal day in Brooklyn.

“Tony, where are you going with this?” Rhodey asked narrowing his eyes.

“Just watch. Jarvis, zoom in please.” Tony pointed towards the image and pointed grimly. Invisible to the naked eye was a small red dot and upon further zooming, it looked like a man who was in the air presumably flying but his actions mimicked swinging.“ that kid right there is our guy," 

"Does he have any powers?” Natasha asked Tony subconsciously leaning forward. Everyone was now interested, giving Tony their complete attention. Tony smirked internally yelling I told you so.

“His parlour tricks are pretty neat. He shoots webs, has super strength. Probably has enhanced senses too,” Tony explained flailing his arms around. A clear sign that he’s drunk.

“So what he’s a mutant?” Steve asks sobering up from the mead Thor brought from Asgard. The only reply he got was a non-committal grunt

“And why are you showing this to us? Are we recruiting him?” Natasha asks.

“No, the reason I’m showing you this spider boy is because he’s the next Darth Vader, Jarvis start the slideshow,”

“Okay, Tony he is literally saving a puppy from being run over by a food truck,” Natasha frowned at the video of Web pulling a golden retriever pup away from its imminent death.

“wait until you see the next one,”

“Okay, now he’s bringing a kitten down a tree, tony are you sure he’s our guy?” Rhodey questioned him quirking an eyebrow at him.

“And now he’s helping an old lady cross a street, Tony this guy looks like a poster child of superheroes, just let it be. You wasted enough time of ours already,” Clint groaned as he had enough of waiting for something to happen in the future and missing the now.

He shuddered as he remembered that he promised his kids to go out for dinner after watching their favourite Disney movie that they already watched five times in this week, but it looks like dinner has to wait.

“I see that our guests are getting bored. Jarvis, pull out his portfolio,”

“Peter Benjamin Parker 

Age: 16 

Relationship: single 

Guardian(s): May Parker, Benjamin Parker (deceased) 

Occupation: Student, Intern at Stark Internship 

Residence:…”

“All right that’s enough. That’s it, I’m out, I’m not going to be in a plan to terrorise a poor kid. Good night everyone,” Clint was out of the door before anyone could say anything. Clint’s departure made the group look amongst themselves. Silently communicating who’s going to pull Tony out of his funk.

The Captain sighed before he began.

“look, Tony… I know that you think that the whole Ultron thing was your fault, okay it kinda is but that doesn’t mean you can harass a kid,”

“Not to mention stalk the said16-year-old,” Natasha added dryly as she got up dusting Cheeto dust off her dust and made her way to the door.

Tony cursed before he said,

 "Wait, Widow! You might want to see this. JARVIS tell them about the girlfriend,“ Tony waved his hands in the air as Natasha sighed and sat beside Cap exchanging a look that said 'if he gets any crazier I’m killing him’

It wasn’t long before Jarvis showed your pictures, your details and your last seen whereabouts. The latest update on your story was that there were no updates. In a recent interview, your parents publicly broke down in front of the cameras begging for someone to come forward and say something and for someone to save their daughter. 

The slide show ended with a picture of you and Peter. You were hugging Peter from the behind and gave the camera a huge smile, your eyes twinkling with happiness. In the next picture, you were kissing Peter’s cheek his grin so wide that it occupied his entire face.

"She’s so beautiful,” said Pepper, who hasn’t spoken a word the entire evening. These days Pepper stayed quiet silently observing as her now Fiancé drove himself crazy with all the insufferable scenarios and wild predictions of the future.

“She is and she’s missing. There were no traces left by her. The last time she was heard of was when she left a voice mail to her the then boyfriend to break-up with him because he was acting suspiciously. And guess who goes missing immediately after. BINGO! Her,”

Although it was truly a heartbreaking incident it wasn’t their line of field. They handled aliens and Nazis, not missing teenage girls and Natasha voiced this concern.

“So? A girl goes missing and you decided to go Nancy Drew on her? Maybe she just ran away. Her heart was broken and she wanted some space,” Natasha suggested making her voice soft to cushion the harsh words she spoke. The words seemingly Dismissing the girl’s disappearance and the grief of her family.

“She disappeared without any trace Romanoff, do you really believe a teenage girl who ran away because of a high school boyfriend is smart enough to disappear without any paper trail and without any digital trace as well?” Natasha grew quiet as she contemplated Tony’s words. He was right. 

“So what? You think she’s involved in some organisation? Even so, why her?” Captain frowned as he tried to make sense of the situation, it wasn’t a difficult case but it was a little suspicious.

“There are Countless conspiracy theories online ranging from a foreign boyfriend to alien abduction. I have one myself and I know who to keep my money on,” Tony snapped his fingers as a new slideshow started.

“Remember New York? Ultron?” Tony asked. 

“Who doesn’t?” Pepper replied rolling her eyes and narrowing her eyes at her fiancé confused as to why he started talking about a drastically different topic.

“Well has anyone of us wondered what happened to the mess we left behind? The remains from the tesseract? We didn’t because we trusted SHIELD to take care of it. Well were fools to do so. Look,” he pointed to the projection and started it.

The video started off normally. Two men wearing trench coats were talking in a parking lot and soon their talking progressed into a heated argument and one of them pointed a gun towards the other and gestured towards a suitcase and the man fired at him but instead of a bullet a flash of blue engulfed the other man and in the span of seconds he disappeared right in front of their eyes without any trace.

“Looking familiar?” Tony asked looking at the horrified avengers glancing at each other hoping that the video was fake.

“Well, it looks like we have some leftovers,” said Rhodey as he looked at the corner of the picture where the red and blue wearing superhuman lurked. 

The grumbling of your stomach awoke you from your sleep. Your skin was papery and your eyes sunken deep in your skull. It had been days since you ate, ages since you tasted the sweet nothing taste of water. You could be wrong but you didn’t care about being right now.

The only thing that kept you going was him. His easy smile even though life had given him nothing but grief. His gentle touch that brought comfort and hope warmed your heart. You felt ashamed for having hope. You should’ve made your peace with them already. You were behaving like a weakling and they would be here soon. You couldn’t wait to get out here, and you didn’t care how you do. You just want an out.

As I promised here are the avengers! I promise that you would see Peter in the next chapter again. and also that there would be action!

summary: marvel bending au
title: marvel bending au
body:
Steve - earthbender

Tony - earthbender (accidental self-taught metalbender, prefers metalbending)

Thor - firebender (could use lightning from a young age, had to learn to control it)

Sam - airbender

Bucky - waterbender (was taught to bloodbend but very very rarely uses it since it was used against him and he did NOT like it)

Natasha & Clint - non benders (she’s good with knives and he’s got archery because of course)

Bruce - airbender/Hulk - earthbender

Wanda - firebender

Pietro - waterbender (he’s an anchor for his sister)

Vision - non bender (enamoured by wanda’s fire *wink wink*)

Rhodey - waterbender

Scott - airbender (easier to pickpocket if you don’t even use hands + he’s just a Happy Boi)

Hope - firebender

Loki - waterbender (can bloodbend and is not against using it and Thor often tries to dissuade him from it, prefers ice)

Korg - earthbender

Heimdall - non bender (but is a fkn beast with a sword)

Valkyrie - firebender

Strange - AVATAR (firebender)

Wong - airbender

Peter - airbender

T’Challa - waterbender

Shuri - earthbender (metalbender)

Okoye - firebender

Pepper - non bender

Guardians - non bender outlaws (groot is animal companion)

summary: The MCU quite frankly sucks as a cinematic universe. Half the core movies suck, most of them are just sequels which kind of...
body:
The MCU quite frankly sucks as a cinematic universe. Half the core movies suck, most of them are just sequels which kind of lessens the appeal, and most of the shows are so loosely connected to the movies they could easily be their own universes.

Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D is the closest to being relevant, but the movies all completely ignore it and the show has to correct the movies and tie up loose ends, making it lose some of it’s individuality in a false manner. Then the only five characters from the movies to ever appear are Coulson (who is never mentioned in the movies again), Nick Fury and Maria Hill (both in brief cameos, Hill being basically pointless in everything), Lady Sif for an episode so they can ride that Thor 2 wave, and the scientist from Thor literally no one cares about, including the characters. That’s the big one.

Runaways has basically nothing to go on, other than general references to superheroes.

The Netflix shows only have each other in common, there are almost no references to the movies, Inhumans apparently don’t exist, and no one (including Shield) has been able to discover all the super powered people and mass murderers running around like eight city blocks.

The one thing that actually ties them together in anyway? Roxxon. A fucking background prop does more work connecting the Netflix and Hulu shows to the MCU than the actual plots.

summary: I was talking to someone I just met last night about the Marvel movies and he said that he didn't like Deadpool because he's not...
body:
I was talking to someone I just met last night about the Marvel movies and he said that he didn’t like Deadpool because he’s not part of the Avengers storyline, so what was the point of him having a movie?

I just love how that makes no sense whatsoever.
